@Getter

private Long id;
private String name;
private String cellphone;

public User(Long id, String name, String cellphone){
this.id = id;
this.name = name;
this.cellphone = cellphone;
}

public User toView(User user){

this.name = user.name;
this.cellphone = user.cellphone;
return this;
}
}
